content: the berry beanie crochet pattern is a fun beanie that uses a variation of the bobble stitch called the berry stitch in addition i added one of my favorite textures working in the half_double_crochet third loop materials-- 85g/152yds worsted weight yarn i used i love this yarn in fruit salad h/5 0 mm hook yarn needle scissors level-- intermediate approx finished size small adult -- 18 x 8
